title: Aubrey O'Day, 35, denies she's had plastic surgery as she shows off ample assets at Hollywood event
text:
She burst on to the scene in Sean 'Diddy Combs' MTV reality show Making The Band 3 in 2004.

And Aubrey O'Day is still as beautiful today as she was 15 years ago ... and she is adamant that she has never gone under the knife to achieve that.

'I know all the tricks and I use them. I’ve had lip fillers and Botox. I put a lot of filters,' the singer-songwriter, 35, told Us Weekly at the Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars Family Edition premiere in West Hollywood on Thursday.

Bombshell babe: Aubrey O'Day showed off her wrinkle-free face and hourglass figure at the Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars Family Edition premiere in West Hollywood on Thursday

Those 'tricks' included going to a Beverly Hills plastic surgeon for a body contouring and fat loss 'laser liposuction' treatment before her appearance on Ex On The Beach this summer,

Aubrey had the minimally-invasive procedure, called AirSculpt, on her chin and abdomen.

The celebrity has been criticized for looking 'different' but the Danity Kane girl band alum said she ignores the haters.

Admitting that comments would've hurt 'when I was 17 maybe' now it didn't bother her at all.

Quite a shot: Aubrey's decolletage was on full display. She admitted she had AirSculpting on her chin and abdomen this summer

'I think the worst comment I ever read, and then I didn’t read any more, was, "She looks like an old leather handbag that’s been put in the dryer 15 times." That was one of my faves.'

And she added: 'I look in the mirror. I know what I look like. I love me! I’m the happiest I’ve ever been.

'I wish I was youthful in regards to my energy. I can’t do Barry’s Bootcamp twice a day anymore.

Before and after: Aubrey in 2007 in her Danity Kane days and her look on Thursday

'As I get older, there’s so much pressure on women to be skinny or to have tinier bodies and every little inch that I gain I’m so affected by it, and I’ve gotten to a place that I’m like, I’m healthy, I don’t take drugs, I barely drink, I exercise every day and I feel mentally happy.

'I don’t need anything other than what I’m doing because it’s working for me.'

Presently single, the reality star split from Jersey Shore's Paul 'DJ Pauly D' DelVecchio in July 2017.

Hanging with the gals: Aubrey posed with reality stars Farrah Abraham, 28, and Laura Govan, 40, on the carpet at the Hollywood event

Now Aubrey is looking for a 'kind and compassionate' man who can 'laugh at life.'

She would love to do a reality dating show - particularly 90 Day Fiance or the Bachelorette .

'I think I’m too controversial for that show, but oh, man, if they want to step into the dark side, someone needs to put me on that.'
description: 'I know all the tricks and I use them. I've had lip fillers and Botox,' the 35-year-old singer-songwriter revealed at the Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars Family Edition premiere in West Hollywood, Thursday
